instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1286: What is A1286? A1286 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2009 , Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2255, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2330, 820-2532, 820-2523, 820-2533, 820-2850, 820-2915, 820-3330..
definitions.A1398: What is A1398? A1398 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2015, Mid 2012, Early 2013, Late 2013, Mid 2014 with EMC 2909, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00138, 820-00163, 820-00426, 820-3332, 820-3662, 820-3787..

threads.title: Replace keyboard macbook retina
threads.message: It is possible to replace keyboard in Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1286</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - 15 from 2012 retina or I need to buy this: [url]http://www.ebay.es/itm/MacBook-Pro-Retina-<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>-15-2-3-Mid-2012-Palmrest-Keyboard-US-Battery-/272441934011?hash=item3f6ece00bb:g:pCAAAOSwMVdYIR95[/url]

threads.title: Replace keyboard macbook retina
threads.message:
You can rip out the old one, then remove all the rivets and use screws to put in the new one. But at 65 that is pretty cheap for a complete topcase with battery. 
Also <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1286</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> from 2012 is not a Retina. <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> is the retina

threads.title: Replace keyboard macbook retina
threads.message: Yes, it is <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>. Can I use screws from <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1286</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> or they are different?

threads.title: Replace keyboard macbook retina
threads.message: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1286</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> screws are fine.
